headline: Devil's in the Details (and Georgia)
sentences: Kemp will push for a new state law that would loosen requirements to carry a handgun in public, as he aims to blunt a primary challenge from fellow Republican David Perdue in this year's governor's race.
Brian Kemp listens to a question during a news conference at the State Capitol in Atlanta.
FILE - In this April 3, 2021, file photo, Georgia Gov.
